phrases: Master, where should we head next?
We bought the ingredients for the hot pot, right?
That just leaves toilet paper and shampoo...
I guess you get one of these when you get popular.
You are not supposed to ask them to make one yourself.
I loved reptiles so much that I turned into one.
I am not letting any of you girls get away!
I want to quit being a hero.
That guy's the strongest hero in the world!
I knew I saw you somewhere!
He will stomp you in a single blow!
I-I-I am terribly sorry for what I have done!
Take care of him, Mr. King!
How did it come to this?
He is starting to have a seizure while he is groveling!
Did you show up because you sensed the monster, King?
No, I was about to go shopp
Hey, you cannot just talk to King like that.
Er, I do not really mind.
Could I just get a handshake?
Would you mind leaving me alone?
I was able to buy it.
The first-press limited edition of Heartthrob Sisters 2 .
I can never get enough of the excitement
I feel as I walk home after buying a new game.
I cannot wait to get home and play.
Master, I believe that gentleman is King after all.
He was one of the heroes at the Class S gathering.
The first sequel in three and a half years...
That man somehow claims your place as the strongest man in the world.
But what in the world is he doing here?
This might be a good opportunity to see King's true power.
Let us see how things go.
A machine god that the organization created.
You are the Class S hero King, are not you?
You are aware that I am King...
A Class S Rank 7 hero, and the strongest man on Earth?
I am saying that I have come to kill you!
You have never heard of the King Engine?
It is the sound you hear once King's in combat mode!
It is said that there is been no monster that made it out alive after hearing that sound!
This is also a test of my combat AI.
I need you to fight at full strength so I can gather data.
What the hell is this organization?
I have no idea what it is talking about.
All right, but let me go to the bathroom first.
I will only be able to fight at about half-strength if I am holding it in.
That will not give you accurate data, will it?
I shall wait here for ten minutes.
For every minute that you are late, I shall kill ten people.
That thing is a robot... and quite powerful.
It is performance might be higher than mine.
I estimate that it is at least threat level Demon and will be quite troublesome.
I wonder how King will fight it.
How did things end up like this?!
I am scared... I am so scared!
I am a 29-year-old unemployed otaku and antisocial loser!
What the hell is the King Engine?!
I am just twice, no, dozens of times more cowardly than other people!
An evil monster just happened to appear in front of me once
and someone defeated it while I had my eyes closed.
That coincidentally happened over and over again!
But then the Hero Association sent me a Class S certificate,
saying that I was the ultimate rookie.
I mean, it is also my fault because I did not deny it,
but I never thought it would come to this!
I want to quit being a hero so bad.
Think about how to get through this!
It is not like my name's going to intimidate a robot!
Genos, want me to lend you a hand?
In order for me to achieve your
assignment to me and rank in the top ten of Class S,
I need to be able to
defeat something like this on my own!
Make sure you do not lose.
A robotic weapon is rampaging near Central Park in City M.
Residents of the area should immediately evacuate.
I somehow made it home safely, but...
That scary robot is probably going to haunt my dreams.
I will just play some games and try to forget about it.
They put so much work into the openings of the Heartthrob Sisters series.
I can barely contain my excitement.
It would be too embarrassing to use my actual name.
I wonder what I should use.
Yeah, I am not sure about using my hero name.
I mean, having someone call me Big Brother King is just...
Who the hell is this guy?
You cannot just come in here uninvited!
D-Do you know that I am a Class S hero?
Th-This guy is the Class B hero that was at the Class S hero meeting for some reason!
I had no idea you were interested in games like this, though.
Oh, that is an action game.
You operate a robot and stuff?
That is the kind of game I am really into!
I bought this thinking it was an action game, but what the heck?
I guess I bought it by mistake!
I totally thought it said Wrathful Shooters!
Then let us play this one.
I mean, you have got time, right?
Who the hell is this guy?
He is only a Class B, but he is super pushy and way too casual with me.
Not to mention, I am older here!
I have melted your internal structures.
Your big body brought upon your downfall.
You are super good at video games.
I have won a few tournaments for some fighting games, but...
So not only are you strong in real life, you are a winner in video games, too?
How long does he plan on being here?
So, why did you run away earlier?
Right now, Genos is fighting in your place.
You are a super strong Class S hero, right?
Why did you run away from the robot monster then?
I came here to ask you that, but you were playing video games.
Did you get bored with the monster?
Could it be that you are so strong that you do not want to fight anymore?
A giant bird has appeared above City M.
That is the third warning just today.
What are you going to do?
Guess the threat decided to come right to you.
Maybe there is something about you that attracts monsters.
I have always been super unlucky.
What do you do in situations like this?
But lately, it is been getting worse.
I mean, if these things are showing up at your house, you have to fight, do not you?
I have to do something about these lasers!
I have no time to waste on you.
Come on, God, give me a break!
That one time, then that other time,
I just got dragged into those messes!
Eventually, someone'll show up to defeat them.
I just happened to be at those places,
but everyone ends up thinking I am the one who defeated those things!
I have never even been in a fight!
I ended up with this hero name because they thought I was the ultimate hero
I am basically nothing but lies.
It appears that you are after King,
but I know someone that is stronger.
You not going to fight, King?
You have got the wrong idea!
I am not the King that society looks up to so much!
If I do not say it now, he is
So your strength and battle history are all lies?
I guess it must be true if you pissed your pants over that bird.
Wait, why are you just standing there?
I guess I am just a guy who is aspiring to be a hero for fun.
Being a hero who lies and cowers in fear?
I mean, it is none of my business, so I am not going to lecture you or anything.
I may have been taking credit for your deeds.
No matter what you think, they think that you are the ultimate hero.
King, are you going to continue with your lies?
Or are you going to quit being a hero?
why do not you just get strong?
Are not you angry with me?
You worked so hard to become a hero, and yet, I...
I will be coming by now and then to play some games.
Dr. Kuseno, these are parts from a robot calling itself the Robot God G4.
It had immense power and superb AI.
If there are any parts from it that I can use, please allow me to do so.
Genos, where did you get this?
Let us give it a try.
I believe I can still make you stronger.
But, Genos, while I know you became a cyborg for the sake of justice,
you should not push yourself too hard.
No, I have to push myself.
Right now, I am trying to rank in the top ten of Class S.
That reckless assignment your master assigned you?
I figured you would say that.
More importantly, Genos, have you gathered any clues about the cyborg?
That rampaging cyborg that destroyed your home?
You seem to be completely focused on your hero activities lately.
I have not been able to track it down at all.
The rampaging cyborg that is destroyed many towns and taken countless lives...
I will track it down, no matter what,
and destroy it with my own hands.
Despite becoming a hero and gaining a master,
it appears that his hatred has not disappeared.
I have been pursuing this cyborg longer than you,
and I know just how dangerous it is.
If you do end up finding it, do not do anything rash and report back to me.
You are calm and intelligent, but your youth can invite disaster.
I am Sitch, the leader of Earth in the Danger Prophecy Emergency Countermeasures Team.
I am deeply grateful that denizens
of the underworld like yourselves would heed our call.
that we will not be looking into your criminal history or activities at this time.
There are a few heroes here, but they are just serving as my bodyguards.
I will murder all of them!
They will not act as long as you do not do anything reckless.
Why do not we just take over the place?
Wanted men with huge bounties and top assassins.
What is Sitch thinking, inviting these ruffians here?
I do not know why he brought them here,
but the nerve these criminals had to actually show up...
I will burn them to cinders if they make even the slightest suspicious move.
Three upper-rank Class A heroes, whose fighting power is close to Class S.
No one here is stupid enough to lose control in front of them.
Where is the hero named Saitama?
Does not he live in these headquarters?
I would appreciate it if we could hold off on anything off topic until later.
You are going to leave without hearing what he has to say?
I will not let that happen, now that you are here.
Level Tiger or higher disasters are happening more often lately.
This month, the rate is six times the last three years' average.
Are these omens of the danger foretold by the great Shibabwa,
The Earth Is in Danger Prophecy Emergency Countermeasures Team Explanation Meeting
the current heroes will be exhausted and unable to deal with the disasters.
The prophecy said the greatest disaster in history will occur
within six months, and clearly, it has not passed.
The Earth is in Danger Prophecy Emergency Countermeasures Team Explanation Meeting
Even Class S heroes are dealing with some of these incidents,
but there are so many disasters happening, there are not enough heroes to go around.
In other words, in the increasingly intense fights to save humanity that lie ahead
you want help from both the good and bad,
as long as they know how to fight.
Does that pretty much sum it up?
H-How did he get his hands on papers I never even handed out?
The thought of playing hero with you losers
This was a great opportunity for outsiders to enter the Hero Association HQ,
but all I know about him are his name, his face, and that he is Class B Rank 33.
In the physical exam portion of the Hero Test,
he crushed every record for every event.
Despite having no notable record of his actions since then,
he managed to climb up from Class C to Class B.
Right after his debut, on top of that.
There has to be something about this man.
There has to be something about him.
First, we are going to find out where he is.
I am going to hunt him down, and I am going to make him regret
the fact that he managed to embarrass me, Sound-of-Speed Sonic.
Hey, why are you taking all the items?
I am still in my default gear!
I can beat them by myself.
The Earth is in Danger Prophecy Emergency Countermeasures Team Explanation Meeting
There better be a reward for this.
